text: @NYGovCuomo @CovidActNow I’m so proud to be a New Yorker! Thank you and your team Governor, for working literally 24/7. I still miss the daily pressers, it was truly therapeutic to see the progress daily, whether it was good or bad. That’s how government should work, period! #COVID19 @I_LOVE_NY
